content: I've also been experimenting with meal prep, and I've been making a big batch of brown rice and roasted vegetables on Sundays to use throughout the week. It's been really convenient to have a stash of healthy food in the fridge when I need it. Speaking of healthy food, I've been trying to cut down on my soda intake, and I've been opting for infused water or seltzer with a squeeze of lime instead. Do you have any other healthy drink options I could try?
